activities: Modern Marketing Concepts, Inc. (MMC) supports our client, a medical device company in Europe.  MMC profiles customers of our client, including hospitals and other healthcare providers.  MMC’s client provides MMC contact information for the facility, including purchasing history.  MMC collects personal data from the clients customers, including name, title, phone, and email.  Other information collected relates to purchasing behaviors and product knowledge.  MMC’s data analytics team in the United States uses the data to evaluate usage patterns and recommend marketing strategies.  Any analysis of data is at the facility level.  If any patient experience is shared by a facility, it is not sent for analysis.  It resides on a local server in the EEU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data, offline data, manually processed data, and human resources data.
